Articles.Content: Protoplanetary Hill

I cool it down.

My asteroid hills.

I sieg your asteroid hills with lots of guns and memes, then defend the hills with an extremely powerful and artificial magnetic field.

**MY** slightly molten hills.
DJ M.Y. thanks you for guarding his hill and takes it back from you.

I pour gasoline on the hill and light it.

My mildly-scorched hill. 

**Edited <time datetime="2019-11-08T18:31:08Z" title="11/08/2019 06:31  PM" data-short="4 yr">November 8, 2019</time> by Fraston**
I take the hill into space. fire burns out. My space hill.
I am a depressed necromancer and revive the suffocated hill. My zombie hill
Hilly-ZomBilly occupy the hill.
I destroy all hills. My crater 2.0

I destroy struts. My shard of hill.
The server shutdown. No more shard at the hill.
I rebuild the hill. My REVIVED hilll
The revived got undead. Your undead hill.
The wall

The wall crumbles.

My hill
... of crumbles

**D I S C R U M B L A T I O N !**

Haha my wall
